metadata.title: CVE-2016-6492 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MT6573FDVT_SetRegHW function in camera_fdvt.c in the MediaTek driverfor Linux allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted applicationthat makes an MT6573FDVTIOC_T_SET_FDCONF_CMD IOCTL call.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
